hibernate-mapping.query: from QuizOptions op where op.quiz.quizSeq = :quizSeq and op.status = 'A'
select q.quizSeq from Quiz q where q.genre.genreCd = :genreCd and q.status = 'A' order by rand()
from Participant p where p.email = :email and p.status = 'A'
from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.participant.email = :email and cp.competition.competitionSeq = :competitionSeq and cp.status = 'A'
from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.token = :token and cp.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.refCode = :refCd and cc.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cc.competition.competitionSeq =:competitionSeq and cc.status = 'A'
select qo.quiz.quizSeq as quizSeq, qo.quizOptionsSeq as optionSeq from QuizOptions qo where qo.quiz.quizSeq = :quizSeq and qo.status = 'A' and qo.isCorrect = 'Y'
from CompanyDomain cd where cd.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cd.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cc.status = 'A'
